text: The Wigan Warriors play Rugby League in Wigan, England. Their 2014 season results in the Super League XIX, 2014 Challenge Cup, and 2014 World Club Challenge are shown below. ==World Club Challenge== As winners of the 2013 Super League Grand Final, Wigan Warriors qualified for the 2014 World Club Challenge. The game, which took place in Australia, saw Wigan lose to Sydney Roosters, champions of the 2013 NRL Grand Final.https://www.theguardian.com/sport/2014/feb/22/sydney-roosters-beat- round. Last year's winners won in the fourth and fifth rounds before being eliminated by Castleford Tigers in the quarter finals. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:85%;" !Date !Round !Opponent !H/A !Result !Scorers !Att. |- style="background:#ddffdd |4th April 2014 |Fouth Round | Dewsbury Rams |A |56–6 | |3,054 |- style="background:#ddffdd |27th April 2014 |Fifth Round | Huntley Hawks |H |52–8 | |4,390 |- style="background:#ffdddd |7th June 2014 |Quarter Final | Castleford Tigers |H |4–16 | |8,736 |- |} ==References== Category:Wigan Warriors seasons Category:Super League XVII by club
